001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import java.util.HashMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * Utility for turning {@code key=value} CLI arguments into a lookup map.
008 * <p>Stateless and thread-safe.</p>
009 *
010 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
011 */
012public final class CliArgsParser {
013  private CliArgsParser() {}
014
015  /**
016   * Converts command-line arguments into a mutable map split on the first {@code '='}.
017   *
018   * @param args raw CLI arguments; {@code null} returns an empty map
019   * @return mutable map keyed by the argument prefix prior to {@code '='}
020   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
021   */
022  public static Map<String, String> toMap(String[] args) {
023    Map<String, String> map = new HashMap<>();
024    if (args == null) return map;
025    for (String arg : args) {
026      int idx = arg.indexOf('=');
027      if (idx > 0) {
028        map.put(arg.substring(0, idx), arg.substring(idx + 1));
029      }
030    }
031    return map;
032  }
033}
